summary: Simple mod that gives you ability to conjure summon that scales with your lvl. Summon advances pararell to a player, gaining better gear and enchants as player levels. It contains Dualist and Ranger but i plan to add tank, 2 hander guy and maybe mage.
descriptionHtml:
1.10: Added Ranger summon. 
1.02: Scaling bug fixes
1.01: Dark face bug fix
1.00: First version of mod containing only Dualist.

Summons was always my way of doing things in various RPGs but Skyrim conjurations are a litte boring. I made this mod that gives ability to conjure scalable summon for lvl 1. Apart from simple level scaling i added many leveled lists so our summon will improve at the same time as we do. He gets weapons, armor and perks proper to our and his level so hes never (in theory didnt test it extensively) to weak or overpowered. Summon advances similar to player having enchanted weapons with enchant strenght appropriate to his level. It contains Dualist and Ranger and i plan to add tank, 2hand guy and maybe some mage as well as some armor enchanting and gear tempering in the future. 

I made this mod purely for myself because i find summons in vanilla skyrim boring either weak or overpowered. The window when they feel just ok is very slim. Also i like to see things around me to evolve and change. Conjuring lvl 46 Dremora lord at lvl 17 that always looks the same was not fun.

Mod will need Dragonborn and Dawnguard addons to work since i used items from these two. 

Bare in mind that this is my first mod so it probably has couple of bugs. Also i use univision Face mod ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569 ) So im not sure how it will look on your configuration. Head darker than body bug is fixed. 

The spell used to conjure is custom and wont overwrite any existing in the game. You should get it as soon as you load the game.

To install it just simply extract it to main Skyrim folder.
